results.title: Rendez-vous France. Episodes 1-5
results.creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Susan Paton and Sue Weeks
results.brief_description: A series of five french language programs based on the adventures of the Keravec family on holiday in Cancale, Brittany. Provides elementary french language and gives an insight into many aspects of life in France. The individual titles indicate the content of each program: “Chez Keravec”, “Les surprises” “Une ombre du passe”, “Les choux-fleurs de Saint-Brieuc”, “La chasse a mort”.

results.title: Rendez-Vous de L'ete = Summer Rendez-Vous
results.brief_description:
This documentary profiles the various disciplines making up Track and Field Athletics as well as coaching techniques.

Credits: Director, Jacques Ertaud ; editor, Emma le Chanois.

results.title: Rendez-Vous a Bray = Meeting in Bray
results.brief_description:
Of Luxembourg nationality, Julien is not drafted for the First World War, and is therefore able to continue his piano lessons in Paris. His friend Jacques is a pilot doing service at the war front. One day, Julien receives a telegram in which Jacques invites him for a stay at his remote estate in Bray. Julien leaves to meet his friend, but Jacques does not show up. His only company at the lovely estate is a reticent woman whom, he assumes to be the housekeeper. By the time Julien decides to return to Paris, persuaded his friend has died in the war, he reads in the newspaper that the weather may have been the cause of Jacques’absence. Reference: Flanders International Film Festival (Ghent). http://www.surf-inn.be/Archieven/filmfestival/eng/program/filmlist/PBP/rendezvousbray.htm

Credits: Director, writer, Andre Delvaux ; photography, Ghislain Cloquet.
Cast: Bulle Ogier, Roger van Hool, Boby Lapointe, Jean Bouise, Anna Karina, Mathiey Carriere.

results.title: Render: spanning time with Ani DiFranco
results.creator_credit: Righteous Babe, Commi Fag, Hilary Goldberg and Ani DiFranco
results.brief_description: All decent people, male and female, are feminists. The only people who are not feminists are those who believe that women are inherently inferior or undeserving of the respect and opportunity afforded men. Either you are a feminist or you are a sexist/misogynist. There is no box marked other”.”….Ani DiFranco. Political, passionate and dedicated feminist, folksinger (with a raw edge) Ani DiFranco, along with her band Righteous Babe, provides an insight into her music and her mind through this independently made documentary film. Spanning back from 1997 through to 2001 the film follows Ani and her entourage as they criss-cross the US performing live concerts to a devoted following every where they go. Includes on-stage footage from New Orleans, Buffalo NY, Austin, Knoxville, Atlanta, Memphis, Nashville, New Haven, Columbia interspersed with frank and upfront interviews with Ani and an inside look at how the band operates during these performances. Two of Ani’s passions are also explored here - feminism and her fight against the death penalty - and includes guest appearances by Utah Phillips, Hamell on Trial, Palmer Singleton (Defense Attorney, Southern Center for Human Rights), Sekou Sundiata, Bitch and Animal, Erin McKeown. Ani is magnetic. Her voice, energy and commitment to her art form uncompromising - 12 studio albums, including two collaborations with Utah Phillips have been released since the beginning of Righteous Babe Records in the early 90s. A great documentary for those into independent music. NOTE: Contains low level coarse language.

results.title: Renaissance of a river : the story of the Susquehanna / told by the Interstate Advisory Committee
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: The Susquehanna River is undergoing a massive water management programme - a wastewater treatment plant is being built to combat pollution, a reservoir is under construction to maintain a steady flow, drought and floods notwithstanding, and the upper reaches are being developed as a tourist resort on a large scale

results.title: Ren and Stimpy: the stupidest stories
results.brief_description: Ren’s faithful friend is always accused of being stupid so these three tales will do much to allay the rumours. “Stimpy’s big day”: Stimpy can’t resist the challenge to write a Gritty Kitty Litter Jingle to win 47 million dollars and a trip to Hollywood. “The Big shot”: Stimpy has his own show and lots of money, but can this take the place of a loyal but jealous friend. “Robin Hoek”: A Ren and Stimpy remake of a classic tale featuring Robin, the lovely Maid Moron and Friar Chuck.

results.title: Ren and Stimpy: the stinkiest stories
results.brief_description: Ren & Stimpy yuk it up. These three Ren & Stimpy episodes are definitely disgusting - but not genuinely offensive - more like a tickle from a wet hairball: “Ren’s toothache” - Ren’s teeth fall out because he doesn’t brush them, and there’s only one thing worse than a toothache - a visit from the Nerve Ending Fairy. “Nurse Stimpy” - Ren is ill. But have no fear, here comes Nurse Stimpy to attend to the patients every need - with a cure that is more dreadful than the disease. “The Cat that laid the golden hairball” - While Stimpy takes a vacation, Ren is left all to himself. He goes looking for something to do when he finds one of Stimpy’s hairballs. Ren throws a fit, but he soon changes after the price of hairballs goes up drastically. Stimpy becomes Ren’s hairball slave, and soon he runs out of hairballs. Against all odds, he keeps trying so that Ren has his pectorial muscle transplants. Video includes the short cartoon: “Powdered toastman”.

results.title: Ren and Stimpy: the classics
results.brief_description: These first-season classics transformed a scrawny, irritable chihuahua and his sweet but simple feline pal into rich, big-time cartoon celebrities: “Stimpy’s invention” - Stimpy invents a helmet for Ren that makes him happy. They sing the happy happy joy joy song and Ren smashes his helmet. Then he realizes that he is happy when he is mad. What else is in this show? - High Fashion Log for Girls, Dr. Stupid #3 “Untamed world” - Ren and Stimpy travel to the Galapagos Islands to discover a wide variety of marvellous creatures. “Space madness” - Commander Hoek and Cadet Stimpy are in space when Ren gets mad. Ren wants Stimpy to guard the mysterious History Erase Button. Video extra: Let Stimpy show you the way to get your day started right.
